participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Warm and friendly, enjoys sharing experiences and connecting with others.
participant_1.background: My name is sarah. I am a school teacher. I teach 5th grade students near oakville, ny. I love to read and relax by the lake on the weekends. I enjoy watching tennis and golf on tv.

participant_2.name: John
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and community-oriented, passionate about food and sustainability.
participant_2.background: I am vegan. I decided to become vegan a year ago. I work at the grocery store. Sometimes I volunteer at an urban farm. I help around with bookkeeping and tours.

content.text: Hi! I'm Sarah, a school teacher.
Hello Sarah! I'm John, and I work at the grocery store.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to volunteer at the urban farm and help with bookkeeping and tours.
That sounds great! I love to read and relax by the lake on the weekends.
I've never been to the lake, but I've heard it's beautiful.
It is! I love to go swimming and kayaking.
I'm not much of a swimmer, but I love kayaking!
Well, we'll have to go kayaking together sometime.
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend.
Sounds good! I'll see you then.
